definition: to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: I couldn’t resist rolling down the window. As soon as I did, I heard waves crashing along the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住搖下車窗，立即聽到了波濤沖刷海岸的聲音。

sentences.english: Janie finally cannot resist speaking up, scolding the men.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮最後忍不住，大聲責罵那些男人。

sentences.english: I couldn't resist asking him whether he was dying to eat some pork with fermented mustard greens.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住問他會不會很想喫梅乾扣肉？

sentences.english: Sherry couldn't keep from crying when she heard the terrible news.
sentences.chinese: 雪麗聽到這個壞消息的時候，忍不住哭了出來。

sentences.english: Everyone in the small observation post was failing to hold back tears.
sentences.chinese: 在這個小小觀察站的所有人都忍不住掉下眼淚。

sentences.english: He tried to stay his joy, but couldn't help laughing.
sentences.chinese: 他試圖掩蓋住他的喜悅，可還是忍不住笑了起來。

sentences.english: The movements he made were so comical that I was hard put to it not to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他作出的動作是如此的滑稽以至於我忍不住大笑。

sentences.english: White the show cannot assisted but satirizing 1.
sentences.chinese: 白秀忍不住諷刺了一句。

sentences.english: When an acquaintance into a friend, I might ask him. If he says: don't believe.
sentences.chinese: 當一個朋友成爲好朋友，我忍不住會這樣問他。

sentences.english: I couldn't stop condemning the hateful Song Lu.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住罵聲可恨的宋路者。

sentences.english: Jiang Hua laughed at that, and she could not help joining in.
sentences.chinese: 她看見江華噗哧笑了，自己也忍不住地笑起來。

sentences.english: She smiled in such a way that Bob couldn't help liking heR.
sentences.chinese: 她如此的微笑，以致於包伯忍不住喜歡她。

sentences.english: This is where after a few minutes in line you'll succumb to the temptation of the candy rack and a magazine you've been leafing through.
sentences.chinese: 在排隊的時候你會忍不住糖果的誘惑。

sentences.english: Unable to resist, the sailor asks "How'd you end up with a peg-leg?"
sentences.chinese: 海員忍不住了，他問“你爲什麼會要裝上假木腿？”

sentences.english: When he Listend the news, he get ton't hunter crying.
sentences.chinese: 當他聽到這個消息時忍不住哭了。

sentences.english: The black king in ice on a non-working cannot help keep call spittor king.
sentences.chinese: 黑大王在冰牢度日如年，忍不住不停地召喚金蟾大王。

definition: to be unable to repress sth/to be unable to contain oneself
to be unable to hold back
Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
cannot help laughing/unable to restrain a smile
